message:
One or more required parameters for this request were not present.
"/getCountryCapital" and "/getFullCountryData" requests must have a "country" parameter.
"/getCountryNamesByRegion" requests must have a "region" parameter.
"/addCountry" requests must have a "name" parameter, a "capital" parameter, and a "region" parameter.
"/removeCountry" requests must have a "name" parameter.
